Desc.entry: Jenny Ryan's subjects are: using magnetic power to help ease aches and pains in people and animals including practical experiments and audience participation; how magnetic devices can save money and help the environment by making gas, oil, petrol and diesel burn more efficiently. Includes demonstrations and the sale of bracelets and other magnetic devices. No fee charged but a voluntary contribution is requested to the Starfish Fund, a charity that supports Cambodian orphans.
